# selectedRowIndexes

**Instance Property**

The indexes of the rule editor’s selected rows.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedRowIndexes: IndexSet { get }
```

## Working with the Selection

- **selectRowIndexes(_:byExtendingSelection:)**: Sets in the receiver the indexes of rows that are selected.

items.description: Sets in the receiver the indexes of rows that are selected.
